snippet: The daily fantasy sports website accepted entries into its contests for the weekend, apparently defying an order from the Nevada Gaming Control Board to quit operating immediately.
abstract: Daily fantasy sports website DraftKings continues to operate in Nevada, despite order from Nevada Gaming Control Board to shut down until company and its employees receive state gambling licenses.
lead_paragraph: The daily fantasy sports website accepted entries into its contests for the weekend, apparently defying an order from the Nevada Gaming Control Board to quit operating immediately.

headline.main: DraftKings Continues to Operate in Nevada
headline.print_headline: DraftKings Continues to Operate in Nevada
